CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Check that we can set breakpoint in collected function
evaluate script and collect function foo..
set breakpoint inside function foo and dump it..
breakpoint at 1
run script again, dump pause location and inline breakpoints..
Script execution paused.
Call stack:
    0) foo (foo.js:2)
    1)  (foo.js:7)
breakpoint at 1
  inline breakpoint at (1, 2)
  inline breakpoint at (1, 11) disabled
Script execution resumed.
